Projects.title: Red Chief Landing Page
desc: The Red Chief Landing Page is a responsive and visually appealing web application created to represent the Red Chief Shoes brand. Developed using modern frontend technologies like React.js and Tailwind CSS, the landing page is designed with a clean layout and a focus on user experience.

It includes various sections such as a compelling hero banner, featured product highlights, customer testimonials, and smooth navigation, all aimed at capturing user interest and promoting the brand effectively. The website is fully responsive, ensuring that it looks and performs well on all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.

Projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
desc: This is my personal portfolio website that I created to showcase my projects and skills. The website is built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. The website is fully responsive and designed to be user-friendly and engaging.
The website has a few features such as a home page, a projects page, a about page, and a contact page. The website also has a few animations and transitions to make it more engaging and interactive.

Projects.title: Ask GPT
desc: Ask GPT is a beautiful, full-featured AI chat application that provides an intuitive interface for conversing with OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model.

This project implements a secure and robust API endpoint for AI-powered chat using OpenAIâ€™s GPT models. Users can send messages to the /api/chat route, which processes the input, communicates with the OpenAI API, and returns intelligent, context-aware responses.

Projects.title: Uttar Pradesh Tourism
desc: This project is a comprehensive web application designed to showcase the rich cultural heritage, historical landmarks, and tourist attractions of Uttar Pradesh, India.
With a focus on clean design and smooth navigation, the project aims to make tourism information easily accessible, promoting exploration of Uttar Pradesh diverse offerings.
